title: In case of non-residential occupier, the area to be given will be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building
clause_text: In case of non-residential occupier, the area to be given will be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building. The renewal tenements in the so completed buildings shall be handed over to the respective eligible occupiers of the old building as certified by the concerned Competent Authority free of encumbrances.
